review: Awesome guest House, not having very much fame but if you foody ,,,lover of tasty food,,, awesome stay,,,, surely can go for it. Sonam Noorboo and his wife just two awesome friends you find there , a mouth watering tasty food you can get, there all time running hot water and uninterrupted electricity upto their limit. In one word awesome.....
name: GOURAB GOSWAMI
